ePujas.title: Dhanteras – Festival of Prosperity and Divine Wealth
ePujas.subtitle: Dhanteras marks the beginning of Diwali, symbolizing the arrival of abundance, good fortune, and spiritual prosperity. It is not only about material wealth but also inner light and divine blessings.

benefits.heading: Benefits of Dhanteras Puja
benefits.description: Dhanteras Puja invokes the blessings of Goddess Lakshmi and Lord Dhanvantari, bringing harmony, abundance, and good health. Performing this puja ensures that both spiritual and material prosperity flourish in your home.
points: Invites wealth, prosperity, and positive energy into the home
Removes financial obstacles and ensures business growth
Brings blessings of Goddess Lakshmi for abundance and fortune
Promotes health and longevity with prayers to Lord Dhanvantari
Purifies the environment with divine light and Vedic mantras

packages.title: Basic Dhanteras Puja
packages.description: Perform a simple yet auspicious Dhanteras Puja with all essential items and blessings from our pandits.

packages.title: Standard Dhanteras Mahapuja
packages.description: A complete in-person Dhanteras Mahapuja including Lakshmi-Ganesh worship, Dhanvantari invocation, and Havan.
features: Temple Prasad and blessings for family

rows.features: Video Call Puja + Samagri Kit + Prasad

templeDetails.heading: Our Temple Network for Dhanteras Blessings
highlights: Associated with ancient Lakshmi temples for authentic rituals
Special blessings from Dhanvantari and Lakshmi temples in Varanasi and Vrindavan
Pure Prasad and sanctified coins from temple rituals delivered to devotees

ePujas.title: Diwali Puja – Festival of Lights and Prosperity
ePujas.subtitle: Wishing you a Diwali that sparkles with joy, love, and divine blessings. Let the light of diyas remove darkness from your life and fill your heart with peace, kindness, and abundance.

benefits.heading: Benefits of Performing Diwali Puja
points: Invokes the blessings of Goddess Lakshmi for wealth and prosperity
Removes financial and emotional negativity from home and workplace
Brings peace, harmony, and happiness among family members
Ensures good fortune and success in upcoming endeavors
Strengthens spiritual growth through light and devotion

packages.title: Basic Diwali Puja
packages.description: A simple Diwali Puja with all essential samagri and blessings for your family.

packages.title: Standard Diwali Puja
packages.description: Extended Diwali Puja with Havan and Deep Daan for prosperity and protection.
features: Complete puja samagri with Deep Daan set

packages.title: Premium Diwali Maha Puja
packages.description: A grand Diwali celebration including Lakshmi-Ganesh Puja, Kuber Puja, and Havan.
features: Temple Prasad from Mathura or Varanasi

templeDetails.heading: Our Association with Prominent Temples
templeDetails.description: Our Diwali Puja rituals are connected with sacred temples dedicated to Goddess Lakshmi and Lord Ganesha, ensuring the most authentic Vedic processions and blessings for devotees.
highlights: Option for live darshan from participating temples
Temple Prasad delivery included in Premium package
Conducted by trained Vedic pandits from Mathura and Varanasi

ePujas.title: Bhai Dooj Poojan – Celebrating the Sacred Bond of Siblings
ePujas.subtitle: Celebrate this festival of love and protection with traditional Bhai Dooj rituals, symbolizing the unbreakable bond between brothers and sisters.

benefits.heading: Benefits of Bhai Dooj Poojan
benefits.description: Bhai Dooj, also known as Bhau Beej, strengthens the sacred relationship between brothers and sisters. Sisters perform this puja to pray for their brothers’ long life, prosperity, and happiness. Our Vedic pandits conduct authentic rituals as per ancient traditions to bless the entire family with harmony and divine grace.
points: Strengthens love and protection between brothers and sisters
Blesses brothers with long life, health, and prosperity
Removes negativity and promotes family harmony
Invokes divine blessings of Yama and Yamuna for mutual well-being
Brings happiness, peace, and spiritual bonding within families

packages.title: Basic Bhai Dooj Puja
packages.description: Simple Bhai Dooj Puja with traditional tilak and blessings.

packages.title: Standard Bhai Dooj Poojan
packages.description: Complete Bhai Dooj Poojan with Yama-Yamuna mantra chanting and aarti.

rows.features: Video Call Pooja + Tilak Samagri + Prasad

templeDetails.heading: Our Temple Network for Bhai Dooj
highlights: Associated with ancient Yamuna temples where Bhai Dooj originated
Puja performed as per Yama-Yamuna tradition for long life and prosperity
Blessings and Prasad available from associated temples

ePujas.title: Govardhan Puja
ePujas.subtitle: Celebrate the divine act of Lord Krishna lifting the sacred Govardhan mountain to protect devotees.

benefits.heading: Benefits of Govardhan Puja
benefits.description: Govardhan Puja, also known as Annakut Puja, commemorates the day when Lord Krishna lifted the Govardhan mountain to protect the people of Braj from torrential rain. Performing this puja brings divine protection, prosperity, and harmony with nature.
points: Invokes blessings of Lord Krishna for protection and prosperity
Removes obstacles and negative energies from home and life
Promotes gratitude towards nature and divine forces
Ensures good health, wealth, and happiness in the household
Brings divine grace and strengthens family unity

packages.title: Basic Govardhan Puja
packages.description: Simple Govardhan Puja performed with essential samagri and online pandit guidance.

packages.title: Complete Annakut Poojan
packages.description: Full Govardhan and Annakut Puja including havan, Govardhan parikrama, and prasad.

rows.features: Video Call Puja + Samagri + Temple Prasad
Full Puja + Havan + Annakut Offering + Prasad

templeDetails.heading: Our Temple Network
highlights: Connected with sacred Govardhan Hill temples in Braj region
Rituals performed as per Vaishnav tradition
Prasad from Shri Giriraj Ji temples in Govardhan and Vrindavan

ePujas.title: Durga Puja – Invoke Divine Strength and Protection
ePujas.subtitle: Celebrate the power and grace of Maa Durga with sacred rituals, devotion, and blessings from experienced Vedic Pandits.

benefits.heading: Benefits of Durga Puja
benefits.description: Durga Puja honors the supreme goddess Maa Durga — the embodiment of Shakti, strength, and righteousness. Performing this puja removes negativity, empowers devotees, and brings divine blessings for protection, prosperity, and success in life.
points: Invokes divine protection and strength from Maa Durga
Removes fear, negative energies, and planetary doshas
Brings prosperity, good fortune, and spiritual upliftment
Promotes courage, wisdom, and confidence in personal and professional life
Ensures peace, health, and harmony in the household

packages.title: Basic Durga Puja
packages.description: Simple Durga Puja with essential samagri and virtual pandit guidance.

packages.title: Complete Navratri Puja
packages.description: Full Durga Puja including havan, Durga Saptashati path, and sankalp rituals.

templeDetails.heading: Our Temple Network
highlights: Associated with famous Shakti Peeth temples across India
Rituals performed by certified Durga Upasak Pandits
Blessings and prasad from renowned temples

ePujas.title: Shree Lakshmi Puja – Invoke Prosperity and Divine Wealth
ePujas.subtitle: Worship Maa Lakshmi, the Goddess of wealth, prosperity, and fortune, to invite abundance and happiness into your life.

benefits.heading: Benefits of Shree Lakshmi Puja
benefits.description: Lakshmi Puja is performed to seek the blessings of Goddess Lakshmi — the divine embodiment of wealth, prosperity, and fortune. Our Vedic Pandits conduct the rituals following traditional procedures to attract abundance and remove financial obstacles.
points: Brings prosperity, happiness, and success in business and career
Removes financial difficulties and attracts new opportunities
Ensures harmony, peace, and spiritual growth in the household
Invokes divine blessings for long-lasting wealth and stability
Eliminates negative energies and enhances positive vibrations at home

packages.title: Basic Lakshmi Puja
packages.description: Simple Lakshmi Puja with essential samagri and online pandit guidance.

packages.title: Complete Lakshmi Havan
packages.description: Comprehensive Lakshmi Puja with havan, mantra chanting, and sankalp.
features: In-person Vedic Pandit for full rituals
Prasad and yantra for the entire family

rows.features: Video Call Puja + Samagri + Lakshmi Prasad

templeDetails.heading: Our Temple Network
highlights: Associated with prominent Lakshmi temples across India

ePujas.title: Dussehra Puja – Celebration of Victory of Good over Evil
ePujas.subtitle: Join us in celebrating the divine triumph of Lord Rama over Ravana with traditional rituals and Vedic blessings.

benefits.heading: Benefits of Dussehra Puja
benefits.description: Dussehra Puja marks the victory of Lord Rama over Ravana and the triumph of righteousness. Performing this puja removes negative energies, restores balance, and brings strength, protection, and success in all endeavors.
points: Removes negative energies and evil influences from life
Brings strength, courage, and victory in challenges
Ensures peace, harmony, and prosperity in family and business
Invokes divine blessings of Lord Rama and Goddess Durga
Promotes self-confidence and righteousness in daily life

packages.title: Basic Dussehra Puja
packages.description: Simple Dussehra Puja with essential rituals and samagri included.

packages.title: Complete Dussehra Yagna
packages.description: Comprehensive Dussehra Puja with havan, Durga visarjan, and Ram Parayan.

packages.title: Grand Dussehra Celebration
packages.description: Full Dussehra event with Ramayan Path, havan, and Ravana effigy burning (symbolic).
features: Prasad and blessings for the entire family

rows.features: Grand Ritual + Ramayan Path + Effigy Ritual

templeDetails.heading: Our Temple Network
templeDetails.description: Our Dussehra rituals are performed in association with renowned temples dedicated to Lord Rama and Goddess Durga, ensuring authentic Vedic procedures and divine blessings.
highlights: Connected with ancient Ram and Durga temples of North India
Authentic rituals based on Valmiki Ramayana traditions
Prasad and blessings from temple priests available for devotees

ePujas.title: Chhath Puja
ePujas.subtitle: Celebrate the Sun God and thank nature for prosperity

benefits.heading: Benefits of Chhath Puja
benefits.description: Chhath Puja is dedicated to Surya Dev (the Sun God) and Chhathi Maiya, symbolizing gratitude, purity, and self-discipline. It is believed to bring balance, prosperity, and health.
points: Promotes mental and physical well-being through devotion and fasting
Ensures prosperity, health, and harmony in family life
Removes negativity and brings divine blessings from Surya Dev
Enhances gratitude, self-discipline, and emotional strength
Fulfills desires and brings peace to the household

packages.title: Abhishek Participation
packages.description: Participate in temple abhishek remotely with name and gotra sankalp.
features: Your name included in the puja

packages.title: Live Puja + Prasad
packages.description: Attend live puja via Zoom with special Braj prasad delivery.
features: Temple prasadam delivered to your home

templeDetails.heading: Our Temple Network
templeDetails.description: Our pandits are connected with famous Braj temples like Banke Bihari Ji (Vrindavan), ISKCON Temple (Mathura), Radha Raman Mandir, and others, ensuring authentic rituals as per Vaishnav tradition.
highlights: Associated with ancient Surya and Vaishnav temples in Vrindavan
Blessings from experienced Vraj region priests
Prasad available from our temple network

testimonials.name: Priya Sharma
testimonials.message: We booked a Janmashtami puja with Braj Pandit. The pandit ji was very knowledgeable and performed the rituals beautifully.

testimonials.name: Rajesh Verma
testimonials.message: The Jhula utsav was mesmerizing. Our family felt divine blessings throughout the day.

ctaSection.text: Book Your Krishna Janmashtami Puja Today & Invite Lord Krishna’s Blessings!

faq.question: Is samagri included in the package?
faq.answer: Yes, all puja essentials are included.

faq.question: Can I book for my office/company?
faq.answer: Yes, we provide special corporate puja packages.

faq.question: Will Prasad be delivered?
faq.answer: Yes, Prasad is included as per the selected package.

faq.question: Can I reschedule the puja?
faq.answer: Yes, you can reschedule up to 24 hours before the event.
